summary: This simply adds a crafting recipe to the Skaal Coat, allowing it to be improved at a workbench!
descriptionHtml:
EDIT: v.1.1 adds the rest of the Skaal clothing to the tempering menu, by request. Hat, Gloves and Boots, all for the low low price of 1x Leather.

This mod simply adds a crafting recipe to the Skaal Coat, allowing you to improve it at any workbench. The recipe consists of:

1x Steel Ingot
1x Leather

Please note that this is my first mod - by which I mean, the first time I\'ve ever even opened the Creation Kit. However, I\'ve tested it on my own game with no issues, and it really is a tiny change.

I\'m certain that this\'ll eventually be absorbed into larger mods, like the Unofficial Patch, but this is a quick-fix for those of us who wanted to wear our sexy Inuit armor that little bit sooner. I just really wanted it done now.

Please note: this only adds a tempering recipe - it\'s not craftable at the Forge, so you\'ll need to get the armor as per usual. It\'s also only for the coat, not the rest of the Skaal apparel.
author: MangoMonkey
